attributes.action: Donate a percentage of Tobacco revenue to cancer research.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government earns a vast amount of money each year from tobacco, and alcohol revenue.
With Cancer, and heart disease on the increase the government should donate a percentage of this income to Cancer research, and the heart foundation to help with research.
Then if you choose to smoke or drink you are paying money towards research, and treatment of youself, and others even if they chose not to smoke, or drink.
